block_comment: The block of code manages the state transitions for memory control based on the MCB_RDY_BUSY_N signal. If the MCB_RDY_BUSY_N signal is not active (represented here by the ‘!’ operator), it shifts the state to LDQS_PIN_N_TERM_WAIT. If the MCB_RDY_BUSY_N signal is active, it sets the state to UDQS_CLK_WRITE_P_TERM and assigns the IODRPCTRLR_MEMCELL_ADDR to PTerm.
